data.title: Careers at NXP
data.meta_description: Browse job openings around the world and take your career to the next level, NXP offers plenty of employment opportunities.
data.text:
At NXP, we believe in a world that anticipates and automates to meet our needs. We believe our people help make it real, for everyone. We are NXP

Learn about the real-world opportunities and experiences NXP offers students, recent graduates and individuals in the first stage of their career. Work alongside industry leaders and innovators on the latest enabling technologies.

“With the help of NXP-organized internal and external trainings, I was able to acquire new and useful skills, which helped deepen my knowledge and expertise in the field of cryptography and security. I regularly attend international conferences in order to represent NXP in this business area.”

Laurie, Security Architect, NXP Austria

View team member testimonials
